usage.dau_mau.rationale: The stickiness is calculated to be 0.25, indicating a declining trend in user engagement. The limited number of unique users and activities suggests material risks to user retention.

actions.action: Analyze user feedback to identify engagement barriers
Implement targeted re-engagement campaigns for inactive users
Enhance content offerings based on user interests

usage.creators_ratio.rationale: The creator share is less than 8%, indicating a significant failure in engagement and urgent action is required to increase creator participation.

actions.action: Implement targeted outreach to convert viewers to creators
Develop incentives for users to create content
Conduct workshops to educate users on the benefits of being a creator

usage.session_depth.rationale: The average session duration and page views are significantly below target thresholds, indicating a critical failure in user engagement.

actions.action: Investigate user engagement strategies to increase session duration
Enhance content quality to encourage more page views
Implement user feedback mechanisms to identify pain points
Analyze session logs for patterns in user drop-off
Consider promotional campaigns to drive user activity

usage.drilldown.rationale: Drill actions are absent from the interaction logs, indicating a significant failure in user engagement with drill features. This necessitates urgent action to improve usage.

actions.action: Implement training sessions for users on drill features
Enhance visibility of drill options in the UI
Gather user feedback to identify barriers to using drill features

reliability.refresh_timeliness.rationale: The dashboard has not been refreshed since August 12, 2025, while the current date is August 15, 2025, resulting in a failure to meet the weekly SLA. This indicates a significant failure with urgent action required.

actions.action: Refresh the dashboard immediately
Investigate the cause of the delay in refresh
Implement monitoring for dashboard refresh status

features.cross_links.rationale: None of the dashboards have links, indicating a significant failure in cross-linking and urgent action is required.

actions.action: Implement links on all dashboards
Conduct a review of dashboard content to identify linking opportunities

governance.coverage.rationale: The dashboard is not certified, has no assigned owner, and lacks any metadata, indicating a significant failure in governance.

actions.action: Assign an owner to the dashboard
Obtain certification for the dashboard
Develop and complete metadata for the dashboard

data.source_diversity.rationale: Only a single source is present, indicating a critical lack of diversity and significant risk to data reliability and insights.

actions.action: Identify and integrate additional data sources across multiple domains
Assess current data quality and reliability of the existing source

democratization.self_service.rationale: There are no creators among the users, indicating a significant failure in creator engagement and urgent action is required.

actions.action: Identify potential creators and provide training sessions
Implement incentives for users to become creators
Gather feedback from viewers to understand barriers to becoming creators

decision.traceability.rationale: Less than 15% of decisions are linked to dashboards, and there is no evidence provided to support any decisions.
gaps: Evidence of dashboard links for decisions
More decision logs with linked dashboards

actions.action: Implement a requirement for all decisions to include dashboard links
Train staff on the importance of linking decisions to dashboards
Review and update decision logging processes to ensure evidence is captured

usage.weekly_active_trend.rationale: The WAU shows a sustained decline with only 3 distinct users over the last 4 weeks, indicating material risks to user engagement.

actions.action: Investigate user feedback to identify engagement barriers
Implement targeted marketing campaigns to re-engage users
Enhance content offerings based on user interests

usage.retention_4w.rationale: There are no users returning in the weeks following their initial activity, indicating a significant failure in user retention.

actions.action: Analyze user feedback to identify reasons for drop-off
Implement targeted re-engagement strategies for initial users
Enhance onboarding experience to improve initial engagement

features.export_rate.rationale: Exports and downloads do not occur in any of the recorded sessions, indicating a significant failure in user engagement with these features.

actions.action: Investigate user awareness of export/download features
Implement user training sessions on how to use export/download features
Enhance visibility of export/download options in the UI

features.alerts_usage.rationale: There is very low adoption of alerts/subscriptions, with only view actions recorded and no successful alert or subscription actions. The presence of an error action indicates potential issues with the system.
gaps: Number of users with active alerts/subscriptions

actions.action: Investigate the error reported by user x1
Implement a user feedback mechanism for alerts/subscriptions
Promote alerts/subscriptions to users through training sessions

reliability.sla_breach_streaks.rationale: The dashboard has not been refreshed within its SLA of weekly, resulting in a breach of 3 days. This indicates a material risk to the reliability of the dashboard.

actions.action: Investigate the cause of the refresh failure
Implement monitoring for refresh status
Establish a recovery plan for dashboard refresh issues

reliability.error_rate_queries.rationale: The error rate is 20% based on the single error occurrence out of five total actions, indicating a material risk to reliability. Immediate attention is required to address the underlying issues causing the error.

actions.action: Investigate the cause of the error to prevent recurrence.
Implement monitoring to track error occurrences in real-time.
Review and enhance error handling procedures.

governance.pii_coverage.rationale: There is a complete absence of PII labeling and access controls on the dashboard, indicating a significant failure in governance.

actions.action: Implement mandatory PII labeling and access control policies for all dashboards
Conduct a training session for dashboard owners on PII governance
Establish a review process for dashboard compliance with PII regulations

governance.lineage_coverage.rationale: There is minimal documentation of lineage and no ownership for the dashboard, indicating a significant failure in governance.

actions.action: Establish mandatory lineage documentation for all dashboards
Assign owners to all dashboards
Implement a review process for dashboard governance

data.cost_efficiency.rationale: The source catalog is limited to a single Excel file, indicating a lack of diversity in data sources. Additionally, the dashboard has not been refreshed since August 12, while its SLA is weekly, suggesting material inefficiencies and potential waste.

actions.action: Diversify data sources beyond Excel
Refresh the dashboard to meet SLA requirements

democratization.dept_coverage.rationale: No departments have creators, indicating a significant failure in democratization efforts.

actions.action: Identify and onboard creators in all departments
